name: Clif Bar Builder's Chocolate Mint
description:
A yummy way to get your protein, pre or post workout. Twenty grams of soy and nut proteins wrapped up with a refreshing chocolate mint flavour.No trans fats or hydrogenated oils.May contain traces of dairy, peanuts, wheat, and other tree nuts.Ingredients: soy protein isolate, beet juice concentrate, organic brown rice syrup, organic evaporated cane juice, palm kernel oil, unsweetened chocolate, organic rolled oats, cocoa, organic soy protein concentrate, organic sunflower oil, vegetable glycerin, natural flavours, organic dry roasted almonds, rice starch, evaporated cane juice, inulin (chicory extract) cocoa butter, organic milled flaxseed, organic oat fibre, soy lecithin, salt, red cabbage colour.

        Sustainability
